about_the_game:
• Introduction
Use the evolution direction of biological configuration of small islands.
Combining the ability of the island and the special skills of the creatures.
Build a strong team to win the game.

  • Casual PVE mode

Play Against the Computer

Win Ten Matches to Get victory

  • Ranked PVP mode

Fight With Players

Win Ten Matches to Get victory

After winning, you can continue to play endless mode
